text: Saves the viewport of the current node as a thumbnail
This lets you create a thumbnail of the viewport display at each selected or all nodes.  This is mainly helpful, when you want to illustrate what the nodes do in order, in a sort of
Only Creates an image of the currently selected Node
Creates an image for the current, and each of its downstream connections.

title: Save Node as Thumbnail
summary: Saves the viewport of the current node as a thumbnail
